name: ifconfig.io
short_desc: Inspired by ifconfig.me, but designed for pure speed. A single server can do 18,000 requests per seconds while only consuming 50megs of ram.
author: georgyo
description: fconfig.io is a simple, fast, and free service that provides your public IP address and other related information. It is designed for easy integration into scripts and applications, making it a useful tool for developers and network administrators.
